function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Noncompliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of compliance, enforcement of measures, and improving access to resources for compliance","Technologies":"Digital monitoring tools, contact tracing apps, and public health communication platforms","People":"General population, especially those who are at higher risk","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Intrinsic motivations influencing compliance","Impact":"Inconsistent adherence to measures and potential increase in disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promotion of positive intrinsic motivations through public health campaigns, education, and community support","Technologies":"Behavioral science interventions, community engagement platforms, and social media outreach","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health organizations and community leaders"},{"Description":"Limitations of self-reported compliance data","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of actual compliance and potential misinterpretation of research findings","Mitigation":"Integration of objective compliance measures, such as observation and data analytics, along with self-reported data","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, surveillance technologies, and observational methods","People":"Research participants, data analysts, and public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"}]}
